entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:01 AM CST Sunday 12 March 2023
